Publication Title: A mathematical investigation of polyaneuploid cancer cell memory and cross-resistance in state-structured cancer populations
Publication Authors: Anuraag Bukkuri, Kenneth J Pienta, Robert H Austin, Emma U Hammarlund, Sarah R Amend, Joel S Brown
Publication Abstract: The polyaneuploid cancer cell (PACC) state promotes cancer lethality by contributing to survival in extreme conditions and metastasis. Recent experimental evidence suggests that post-therapy PACC-derived recurrent populations display cross-resistance to classes of therapies with independent mechanisms of action.
